CustomField.description: Sales Leader view of opportunity value. SDS-2737: Renamed this field from SL GRID Amount to SL vGPU Amount
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Sales Leaders, this is a view of the GRID opportunity amount. Used to either communicate potential upside or downside. This is not required if you are aligned with the opportunity dollar value.
CustomField.label: SL vGPU Amount
